flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: The dust-likenscales coveringnits wings arefcolor coded tonindicate the kindsnof poison it has.
The dust-likenscales coveringnits wings arefcolor coded tonindicate the kindsnof poison it has.
The powdery scalesnon its wings arenhard to remove.fThey also containnpoison that leaksnout on contact.
When it attacks,nit flaps its largenwings violently tofscatter its poi­nsonous powder allnaround.
The powder on itsnwings is poisonousnif it is dark infcolor. If it isnlight, it causesnparalysis.
The scales itnscatters willnparalyze anyonefwho touches them,nmaking that personnunable to stand.
VENOMOTH is nocturnal - it is a POKéMONnthat only becomes active at night.nIts favorite prey are small insectsfthat gather around streetlights,nattracted by the light in the darkness.
VENOMOTH is nocturnal - it is a POKéMONnthat only becomes active at night.nIts favorite prey are small insectsfthat gather around streetlights,nattracted by the light in the darkness.
VENOMOTH are nocturnal--they only arenactive at night. Their favorite prey areninsects that gather around streetlights,nattracted by the light in the darkness.
The wings are covered with dustlikenscales. Every time it flaps its wings, itnlooses highly toxic dust.
The dustlike scales covering its wingsnare color-coded to indicate the kinds ofnpoison it has.
It flutters its wings to scatterndustlike scales. The scales leachntoxins if they contact skin.
It flutters its wings to scatterndustlike scales. The scales leachntoxins if they contact skin.
It flutters its wings to scatterndustlike scales. The scales leachntoxins if they contact skin.
When it attacks, it flaps its largenwings violently to scatter itsnpoisonous powder all around.
The powder on its wings is poisonousnif it is dark in hue. If it is light in hue,nit causes paralysis.
Il répand ses écailles poudreusesnen battant des ailes. Elles sontntoxiques au toucher.
It flutters its wings to scatterndustlike scales. The scales leachntoxins if they contact skin.
Il répand ses écailles poudreusesnen battant des ailes. Elles sontntoxiques au toucher.
It flutters its wings to scatterndustlike scales. The scales leachntoxins if they contact skin.

It flutters its wings to scatterndustlike scales. The scales leachntoxins if they contact skin.
ばらまかれた　りんぷんに　ふれるとnからだの　かんかくが　おかしくなってnまっすぐ　たって　いられなくなる。
흩뿌려진 날개 가루에 닿으면n몸의 감각이 이상해져서n똑바로 서 있을 수 없게 된다.
Les écailles qu’il sème ont le pouvoir de paralyserntotalement un ennemi.
Wer die von ihm verstreuten Schuppen berührt,nwird gelähmt und muss sich setzen.
Lanza unas escamas que paralizan a cualquiera.nQuien las toque, no podrá ni ponerse de pie.
Sparge scaglie che paralizzano chiunque le tocchi,nrendendolo incapace di stare in piedi.
The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone whontouches them, making that person unable to stand.
ばらまかれた　りんぷんに　触れるとn体の　感覚が　おかしくなってnまっすぐ　立っていられなくなる。
はねに　りんぷんが　ついていてnヒラヒラと　はばたくたびにnもうどくの　こなを　ばらまく。
날개에 가루가 묻어 있어n팔락팔락 날개를 칠 때마다n맹독 가루를 흩뿌린다.
Ses ailes sont couvertes d’écailles poudreuses.nÀ chaque battement d’ailes, il laisse tomber denla poudre hautement toxique.
Seine Flügel sind mit staubähnlichen Schuppennüberzogen. Mit jedem Flügelschlag verliert esnhochgiftigen Staub.
Tiene las alas cubiertas de un polvillo de escamas quenesparce cada vez que las bate.
Le ali sono ricoperte di polvere velenosa, che liberannell’aria a ogni batter d’ali.
The wings are covered with dustlike scales.nEvery time it flaps its wings, it looses highlyntoxic dust.
羽に　りんぷんが　ついていてnヒラヒラと　羽ばたくたびにn猛毒の　粉を　ばらまく。
やこうせいで　よるに　かつどうを　はじめる。nがいとうの　あかりに　さそわれ　あつまったnちいさな　むしを　このんで　たべる。
야행성으로 밤에 활동을 시작한다.n가로등 빛에 이끌려 모여든n작은 벌레를 즐겨 먹는다.
Aéromite est un Pokémon nocturne, il ne sort donc quenla nuit. Ses proies préférées sont les petits insectes quinse rassemblent autour des réverbères, attirés par la lumière.
Omot ist ein nachtaktives Pokémon. Kleine Insekten,ndie vom Licht in der Dunkelheit angezogen Straßenlaternennumschwärmen, sind seine bevorzugte Beute.
Venomoth es nocturno, solo actúa en la oscuridad.nSu alimento preferido son los pequeños insectos que senconcentran cerca de los focos de luz en la oscuridad de lannoche.
Venomoth è un Pokémon notturno, cioè attivo soltantondi notte. Le sue prede favorite sono i piccoli insetti chensi raggruppano attorno ai lampioni attratti dalla luce nel buio.
Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomesnactive at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gathernaround streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
夜行性で　夜に　活動を　始める。n街灯の　灯りに　誘われ　集まったn小さな　虫を　好んで　食べる。
やこうせいで　よるに　かつどうを　はじめる。nがいとうの　あかりに　さそわれ　あつまったnちいさな　むしを　このんで　たべる。
야행성으로 밤에 활동을 시작한다.n가로등 빛에 이끌려 모여든n작은 벌레를 즐겨 먹는다.
Aéromite est un Pokémon nocturne, il ne sort donc quenla nuit. Ses proies préférées sont les petits insectes quinse rassemblent autour des réverbères, attirés par la lumière.
Omot ist ein nachtaktives Pokémon. Kleine Insekten,ndie vom Licht in der Dunkelheit angezogen Straßenlaternennumschwärmen, sind seine bevorzugte Beute.

Venomoth è un Pokémon notturno, cioè attivo soltantondi notte. Le sue prede favorite sono i piccoli insetti chensi raggruppano attorno ai lampioni attratti dalla luce nel buio.
Venomoth is nocturnal—it is a Pokémon that only becomesnactive at night. Its favorite prey are small insects that gathernaround streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
夜行性で　夜に　活動を　始める。n街灯の　灯りに　誘われ　集まったn小さな　虫を　好んで　食べる。
ハネの　りんぷんは　からだにつくとnなかなか　とれない。しかも　そこからnどくの　せいぶんが　しみこんでくる。
날개의 인분은 몸에 묻으면n좀처럼 떨어지지 않는다. 게다가n거기에서 독성분이 스며든다.
翅膀上的鱗粉一旦沾到身上n就很難甩掉，而且鱗粉帶有的n毒素還會逐漸滲入體內。
Les écailles de ses ailes sont presque impossiblesnà retirer lorsqu’elles se collent à la peau,net elles libèrent un poison violent au contact.
Berührt man die staubartigen Schuppen aufnseinen Flügeln, heften diese sich hartnäckig amnKörper an und sondern darüber hinaus Gift ab.
Las alas desprenden un polvillo de escamasnimpregnado de toxinas que se adhiere alncontacto y resulta difícil de quitar.
Se si attaccano alla pelle, le scaglie chenricoprono le sue ali sono difficili da togliere.nInoltre, rilasciano una sostanza velenosa.
The powdery scales on its wings are hard tonremove from skin. They also contain poisonnthat leaks out on contact.
ハネの　りん粉は　体につくとnなかなか　取れない。しかも　そこからn毒の　成分が　染み込んでくる。
如果不小心把它翅膀上的鳞粉n沾到了身上，那不但会很难去除，n更糟的是毒素也会从那里渗入。
